RumorFact.Text: A planet in the solar system. I hear a signal coming from somewhere on it.

ExploreFact.Text: A mysterious, large door. The Nomai says they haven't been able to open it for centuries.
I convinced every clan to contribute their shard, but we're still missing one.

AltText.Text: I convinced every clan to contribute their shard and found the final missing shard.

ExploreFact.Text: When I put the last shard in, the door swung open.

RumorFact.Text: A Nomai told me that one of the shards was in a Nomai settlement on the north side of the planet.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a Nomai settlement on the north side of the planet. They call themselves the Followers of Greed.
The Nomai told me that, to earn their trust, I have to prove my worth by stealing something from the Followers of Worship. They said that there wasn't anything good to steal right now.

AltText.Text: The Nomai told me that, to earn their trust, I have to prove my worth by stealing something from the Followers of Worship.

ExploreFact.Text: The Nomai said I had to steal the Sacred Shrubbery from the Followers of Worship and bring It to them.
The leader of the Followers of Greed agreed to help us open the Great Door by placing their shard into it.

RumorFact.Text: A Nomai told me that one of the shards was in a Nomai settlement on the north side of the planet.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a Nomai settlement on the north side of the planet. They call themselves the Followers of Exploration.
A Nomai told me I had to give them a cockpit to see their leader.
The leader of the Followers of Exploration agreed to help us open the Great Door by placing their shard into it.

RumorFact.Text: A Nomai told me that one of the shards was in a Ghird village on the south side of the planet.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a strange house that belongs to the Followers of Worship. The door leading inside is locked.
I found a message written by a Nomai. It says the door to the house only opens when you don't have technology with you.
I found a large underground shrine where the Followers of Worship are living.
The leader of the Followers of Worship said that for them to help me I had to find the Sacred Shrubbery. They said It was on one of the islands next to theirs, but they weren't sure which one it was.
The leader of the Followers of Worship said they would help us, but they sounded a little suspicious.
After their Sacred Shrubbery mysteriously disappeared again, they decided to help us by placing their shard into the Great Door.

RumorFact.Text: A Nomai told me that one of the shards was in a Ghird village on the south side of the planet.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a Ghird village on the south side of the planet. They call themselves the Followers of Logic.
The leader of the Followers of Logic agreed to help us open the Great Door by placing their shard into it.

RumorFact.Text: I need a secret code to enter one of the houses.
There is a secret code at one of the Ghird villages that uses shadows in some way.

AltText.Text: The code uses shadows in some way.

RumorFact.Text: The code has something to do with the strange post on the island next to the village.
I saw a strange gem on the wall behind the Ghird. The Ghird said it glows when it's time to pray.

ExploreFact.Text: I solved the code by waiting until the shadow of the strange post was on the side of the building I wanted to enter.

RumorFact.Text: The Nomai at the Great Door told me there was a fifth shard of the key that went missing.
The leader of the Followers of Exploration told me: "Travel to the north pole..."
The leader of the Followers of Greed told me: "Use the stone tainted with blood..."
The leader of the Followers of Worship told me: "Move it to the shortest pillar..."
The leader of the Followers of Logic told me: "Attach a light to the stone..."
I found the Fifth Shard, but I'm not sure how I did it.

ExploreFact.Text: The final piece of the key to the Great Door. I found it on the North Pole locked behind a puzzle with quantum rocks.

RumorFact.Text: A Ghird from the Followers of Logic lost someone named Ernesto. They said that they had taken Ernesto to the South Pole to explore, and last saw him playing on a strange white rock. When the Ghird looked away to check their map, Ernesto mysteriously disappeared. The part about the map was strangely emphasized.

ExploreFact.Text: I found Ernesto by traveling with the white quantum rock to a strange underground house. I had to open my map so that I wasn't observing my surroundings.
